Seit Ausbruch des Krieges greift Russland mit Raketen und Artillerie auch zivile Ziele an, darunter auch Wohnhäuser. I think it has proven that it works I mean just imagine if we had if you compare to 2015 for example where people were fleeing from from the war in Syria and the EU did not activate a temporary protection directive that existed already then but was not activated and that left us also in a situation where we were very much divided on the issue on migration and refugees and asylum. And a lot of asylum systems were really clogged up with a lot of asylum applications. There were long waiting times. Now, of course, there are challenges. I will not deny that. But I think we are dealing with this refugee crisis in a much, much better way.
